column2: §GConvert Counties§! to §GBuddhist§! faster

Has an easier time refounding the Hwarang and also gains extra §GDevotion§! if in the Hwarang
§GCan demand a councillor's spot on the council§!
§GCan pressure another councillor to adopt their voting pattern§!

Periodically attracts the servitude of §Gspecial Chinese characters§!

This weapon is particularly good against dragons.
This weapon is particularly good against trolls.
This can be used to heal you or to improve your health.
This can be used to gain eternal life.
This can be used to set a province ablaze.
This can be used to claim the Dragon Throne.
This can be used to restore the Lost Roman Legion.
